SELECT e.emp_id, e.emp_nm, pos.det_nm AS emp_pos_nm, dep.det_nm AS emp_dep_nm, team.det_nm AS emp_team_nm FROM employee e LEFT JOIN code_detail pos ON e.emp_pos_cd = pos.det_id AND pos.cod_id = 'pos' LEFT JOIN code_detail dep ON e.emp_dep_cd = dep.det_id AND dep.cod_id IN ('dep_erp', 'dep_mes') LEFT JOIN code_detail team ON e.emp_team_cd = team.det_id AND team.cod_id = 'team' WHERE e.emp_id = #{emp_id}

mapper.select: SELECT MAX(d.emp_id) AS emp_id, MAX(e.emp_nm) as emp_nm, MAX(pos.det_nm) AS emp_pos_nm, MAX(dep.det_nm) AS emp_dep_nm, MAX(team.det_nm) AS emp_team_nm, MAX(TO_CHAR(r.res_start_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AS dbdateRange, MAX(r.res_con) as res_con, LISTAGG(al.apl_emp_pos, ',') AS apl_emp_pos, MAX(al.apl_step_no) as apl_step_no, MAX(al.apl_sts) as apl_sts, MAX(al.apl_action_time) as apl_action_time, MAX(al.apl_rremark) as apl_rremark, LISTAGG(code.det_nm, ',') AS app_auth_emp_nm FROM document d LEFT JOIN resignation_doc r ON d.doc_id = r.doc_id LEFT JOIN approval_line al ON d.doc_id = al.doc_id LEFT JOIN employee e ON d.emp_id = e.emp_id LEFT JOIN code_detail pos ON e.emp_pos_cd = pos.det_id AND pos.cod_id = 'pos' LEFT JOIN code_detail dep ON e.emp_dep_cd = dep.det_id AND dep.cod_id IN ('dep_erp', 'dep_mes') LEFT JOIN code_detail team ON e.emp_team_cd = team.det_id AND team.cod_id = 'team' LEFT JOIN code_detail code ON al.apl_emp_pos = code.det_id WHERE d.doc_id = #{doc_id} GROUP BY d.doc_id
